html:
2025-0923
2025-12-11ESDCCanada Student Loans Act
Canada Student Financial Assistance ActRegulations Amending the Canada Student Loans Regulations and the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations Regulations Amending the Canada Student Loans Regulations and the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations in order to (1) expand the loan forgiveness benefit to early childhood educators, dentists, dental hygienists, pharmacists, midwives, teachers, social workers, personal support workers, physiotherapists, and psychologists who choose to work in an under-served rural or remote community; and (2) require that applicants provide at least 400 hours of in-person services in the previous year.Registration: SOR/2025-0271 Publication Date: 2025-12-31
act:
Canada Student Loans Act
Canada Student Financial Assistance Act
subject: Regulations Amending the Canada Student Loans Regulations and the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the Canada Student Loans Regulations and the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations in order to (1) expand the loan forgiveness benefit to early childhood educators, dentists, dental hygienists, pharmacists, midwives, teachers, social workers, personal support workers, physiotherapists, and psychologists who choose to work in an under-served rural or remote community; and (2) require that applicants provide at least 400 hours of in-person services in the previous year.
